Styling tips for buttons

Use color on your buttons to create hierarchy. Buttons with bright or contrasting colors stand out more than plain buttons, so it's often a good idea to reserve certain buttons colors for the primary actions your users use. On the flipside, if you want to de-emphasize a button, you can make the background color the same as your app's background color.

Consider adding a subtle text-shadow to your buttons if you are using white text against a color background. This can help make the text on your buttons "pop" more.
